Hiya Ron
  Heres a few comments for ya (attached)
   
  Thats all from your file some from reverse side too.
   
  There were a bunch more but too many to post to group. Anyway thats what I hear how bout u? I think you just need to slow them down. They speak so quick Ron. Sometimes its like talking to one of those auctioneer guys who talks 100 mph LOL
   
  Theres better things to slow them down I just did a quick jab at it for ya before bed
   
  Misty

Ron Lederer <ronriko@...> wrote:
          I just uploaded a 45 sec sample of a session with evp maker.  I recorded a spanish language tv program and processed it through evpmaker.  I am including 45 seconds of a 2:45 min session so that anyone in the group might comment on the quality of the recording.  I have been getting zero results...that I can hear...maybe I am doing something wrong technically.  Maybe I am not hearing right.  Any opinions or comments would be appreciated.  Ron L     
---------------------------------
  Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile. Try it now.

Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile.  Try it now.
